summary: This mod adds seven new flame spells all based on new colors!
descriptionHtml:
Blood Flames (red) deals a strong and long DoT.

Magicka Flames (blue) abosorbs magicka.

Stamina Flames (green) absorb stamina.

Holy Flames (yellow) deal high damage to undead.

Soul Flames (purple) abosorb health and cast a soul trap effect.

Death Flames (black) burn the enemy and have a chance to insta kill.

Life Flames (white) are just a fancy way to heal.

Obviously the missing color, orange, is the default flames so yeah.

There are rumors that Farengar has stolen the secret of my spells... I suggest looking through his stuff to find the spell tomes.

(If you have my previous mod, Soul Flames, I suggest ditching it before getting this.)

Update 1: Holy Flames now deals 30 damage a second and costs more mana so now it may be useful and Blood Flames no longer affects undead because physically it makes no sense. No blood to boil, right?
author: DrGlockenspiel
